means: 不分心的，注意力集中的，心神不烦乱的

sentence.Network_en: This will create a sterile , undistracted environment.
sentence.Network_cn: 这可提供集中而不被打搅的环境.

sentence.Network_en: Parents, undistracted by the lust for luxury and accorded their children primacy in their lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 父母不为各种享受和权利的欲望分心,孩子才是他们的生活中最重要的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 超纲词汇 - 明明的日志 -... ... undervalue v. 低估 undistracted a. 不分心的，注意力集中的 unenlightened a. 无知的，落后的.

auth_sentence.content: But the New Yorker sitting opposite me, undistracted by this scene, launched into a caustic challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the New Yorker sitting opposite me, undistracted by this scene, launched into a caustic challenge.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the New Yorker sitting opposite me, undistracted by this scene, launched into a caustic challenge.

auth_sentence.content: It's the inside game, cold, sure, undistracted, forever closed off to us.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's the inside game, cold, sure, undistracted, forever closed off to us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's the inside game, cold, sure, undistracted, forever closed off to us.

auth_sentence.content: Becker, undistracted by the charms of tyrants or the cheerful comradeship of their subjects, adopts a more serious tone.
auth_sentence.res_content: Becker, undistracted by the charms of tyrants or the cheerful comradeship of their subjects, adopts a more serious tone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Becker, undistracted by the charms of tyrants or the cheerful comradeship of their subjects, adopts a more serious tone.
